page.title: 18Playground Game -Football
page.content: Football is a game played by 6 but in professional football there are 11 players.You have two posts at each end and there is a goalkeeper.He tries to save the goals.The players tackle. There is a ball. You have to try to get the ball off the other team's players.Then you run with the ball trying to get past the other team with the ball and try to score.You must not pick the ball up but the goalkeeper can.If you hurt somebody it is a freekick but if it is near the goal it is a penalty.If you handle the ball it is a freekick and if it is near the goal it is a penalty.To score a goal you kick the ball and you hope it will go in the goal without the goalkeeper stopping it.Our school team went to Wattisfield .We played against many other schools.We came second in the small schools section.
